entry.def: Someone who is sparing with something uses it or gives it only in very small quantities.

example.ex: I've not been sparing with the garlic...
Her sparing use of make-up only seemed to enhance her classically beautiful features...
example.tran: 一点淡妆反而增添了她五官的古典韵味。

sentences.sentence: "a sparing father and a spending son"
"sparing in their use of heat and light"
"thrifty because they remember the great Depression"
